original_title: Only The Brave: A New Musical
overview: Only the Brave, recounts the raw courage and determination of those who fought and felt the physical and emotional pain of the Second World War.  It tells the story of a group of brave soldiers embarking on a dangerous mission that holds the key to the success of the D-Day Landings. This rousing and original musical interweaves the soldierâ€™s stories with that of their families and loved ones.  Based on true events, Only The Brave evokes the camaraderie and bravery of the second world war generation.
title: Only The Brave: A New Musical
